Test Name: 2-Hydroxyglutaric Acid Chiral Analysis, Quantitative, Random, Urine
Purpose: Accurate and precise quantification of D-2-hydroxyglutaric acid and L-2-hydroxyglutaric acid enantiomers in urine.
Equipment: High-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) system or Gas Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry (GC-MS)
